column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday November 11 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75 / I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed in both directions until further notice due to fire damage from an earlier collision.

column3: I-75 / I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: Traffic on I-75N is being detoured to I-275 to I-471.
